title: Slow vehicles, bulky, and abnormal loads
core: Slow vehicles have orange flashing lights (eg maintenance vehicle lanes, garbage ...). These vehicles often mark a stop and must exceed cautiously. The bulky vehicles have very large and obstruct visibility. So we must also overcome but with caution. The best way to act is to facilitate their passage at intersections or when inserting highway. Because of their weight their speeds are limited. These limitations are listed on the rear of vehicles. Vehicles carrying hazardous materials are identifiable with this orange plate:
